name: BlogAgent.generate_blog
description: Generates a well-formatted blog post in markdown format from a clean transcript using GPT-4. The blog is created with proper structure, formatting, and educational content.

clean_transcript.description: The clean transcript text extracted from the YouTube video (usually from TranscriptAgent.get_transcript)

tone.description: The tone/style for the blog post (e.g., 'educational', 'casual', 'professional', 'conversational')
